name: World Plague Pandemic: Evolved Zombie Invaders
name_original: World Plague Pandemic: Evolved Zombie Invaders
description:
The long awaited Version 2.0 is here! We promised you new levels. We also decided to do a little extra.

* New ways to earn FREE coins used to Upgrade Your Virus!
* Upgrade your virus. Now you can enhance your virus' performance to make it more devastating than ever!
* Fighting the Cure mode. Don't get hit by the white blood cells in this brand new game mode!
* Survival mode. Stay alive for as long as you can in this new time based game mode!
* Play through 9 Level Packs. Don't get too comfortable if the early levels seem easy!
* Bio Weapon Power Ups. Now you can pick up a powerful Bio Weapon during gameplay to increase the radius of your infection!
* And much, much more.


A super scary plague takes over the world. And you are the evil mastermind spreading it!
